question: Which of the following is used in React.js to pass a value from a parent component to a child component?

options.answer: To update the component when props or state change
To remove the component from the DOM
To render the component to the DOM

question: Which of the following methods is called each time the component props or state is updated?

question: Which of the following is true about the React.js componentWillUnmount() lifecycle method?
